entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
